title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.11 - Criteria for selection of service providers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.11 - Criteria for selection of service providers

State Regulations

The selection of agencies to operate programs funded
pursuant to JTP A section 123 shall be based on the following: (a) extent to which priorities identified by
the department are addressed; (b) cost effectiveness of project; (c) capability of agency to carry out proposed project; (d) extent to which matching resources
support project objectives; (e) anticipated results of project; (f) linkages with State, Federal and local resources to extend services to
clients; (g) extent to which
agencies provide comprehensive services to enrollees; and
(h) other criteria which the commissioner at
his discretion may include. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
167.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
